@mike130784

All THETA releases will show up as false positives
you'll have to disable your AV to install them.

They're always clean but if you dont trust THETA or myself, then just pass on the update.

@TAKINI

Not sure what could be the problem.

I installed the game then installed the patch and it works fine.

Make sure you have the prerequisites
things such as the latest visual c++, .Net Framework

Run your compression program on any .EXE's & try to extract. That'll show a lot
If the game crashes on launch for you, install PhysX from nVidia. That solved it for me!
